DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate impact introduction front-of-pack nutrition label fods beverage sell campus cafeteria France nutritional quality purchase . The design involve one site intervention one control site consumer product characteristic .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Front-of-pack Nutrition Label Nutritional Quality Purchases Campus Cafeterias
DOC.detailed_description: The introduction front-of-pack nutrition label think help consumer make healthy choice point purchase . Recently , French government consider introduction 5-Colour Nutrition Label front-of-pack nutrition label . Evaluations 5-CNL suggest efficient help consumer make healthy choice . However , impact vulnerable population yet test . Students think vulnerable population due limited resource unhealthy food choice . The objective present study investigate impact introduction 5-CNL campus cafeteria nutritional quality food purchase . The intervention conduct several month , another similar cafeteria serve control intervention . Data purchase collect regularly , nutritional quality purchase evaluate time intervention situation control situation
DOC.criteria: All subject purchase food beverage select campus cafeteria No individual data collect . Only purchase data collect ( cash register sale data )
